description: Spread the word, help me debug this software, implement cool features, translations, and so on!
summary: As the developer, this is a completely oriented review

description: Adding music to the library during the intro was a breeze and overall navigation was fluid. Failed at basic playback of a simple mp3 file where every other player I have used worked fine. I repeated this test with several other files and found the issue to be with the program. I do not recommend this in it's current state.
